import React, { useContext, useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { fectchCarByIdUser, setCartNone } from "../redux/slices/cartSlice"; import "../assets/styles/cart.css"; const CartComponent = (probs) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const cartStore = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState(0); const idUser = probs?.infoUser?.dataJwt?.id; useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { if (idUser) { dispatch(fectchCarByIdUser(idUser)); } } catch (err) { console.error(err); } }; fetchData(); }, []); const calculatePrice = () => { setTotalPrice( cartStore.listProducts.reduce( (total, product) => total + product.priceProduct * product.quantityProduct, 0 ) ); }; cons return (
{cartStore?.listProducts.length > 0 ? ( <>
{cartStore?.listProducts.length} {" "} Sản phẩm
{cartStore?.listProducts.map((product) => ( ))}
Thông tin sản phẩm Số lượng Thành tiền
{product.nameProduct}
Size: {product.sizeProduct} Giá: {product?.priceProduct?.toLocaleString()} đ
{}} className="py-1 px-1 text-center border border-[#fc6c8f] text-[#fc6c8f] rounded-xl text-sm" />
{( product.quantityProduct * product.priceProduct ).toLocaleString()}{" "} đ

đ

đ

)}
); }; export default CartComponent;
